attributes.action: Ensure patients have the same access to treatments, wherever they live in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make sure that all patients have the same access to the same treatments, wherever they live in the UK (including Scotland and Wales) and stop treatments and costs differing across the country. If people in Wales and/or Scotland get free prescriptions, then all in the UK should. Threatments should not be more easily available in one part of the UK than in others
